overview:
Jeffrey R. Matsen is a California attorney specializing in probate, asset protection and offshore planning.

Jeffrey is a graduate of the UCLA School of Law, where he graduated with honors in the top 10% of his class. He speaks regularly on behalf of the California Bar, has published 25 books and has been named amongst the top 5% of America’s most respected professionals. He has also been repeatedly recognized amongst America’s top 100 attorneys. As a strong family man and father to seven children, he is dedicated to helping successful individuals protect the value of their estate and ensure its transfer to the beneficiaries.

Depending on the client’s goals Jeff creates a customized plan to protect their estate’s value both in life and after their passing. Whether you may potentially face a frivolous lawsuit or owe a exorbitant amount to the IRS, our firm can help you preserve the value of your estate and hard work.
